# Sentinel HUB Analysis

[![N|Solid](data:image/png;base64,)](https://www.sentinel-hub.com/)


# Description

This project is related with the Sentinel-hub Python package and the API use. It has analysis of different scenarios with Sentinel-2 images.
The analysis done were

  - Wildfire analysis
  - True color and SCP (ESA algorithm)

<img src= "Pictures/SWIR_pre.png" width= "300"/> <image src= "Pictures/SWIR_post.png" width= "300">
